alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kiowa County through 245 PM MDT... At 214 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Kit Carson, or 25 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Western Kiowa County
